message.entry: An unexpected object was sent into an SPMD block
Valid arguments are an optional pool parameter followed up to 2 scalar integers specifying the minimum and maximum number of workers to use.
The minimum number of workers specified ({0,number,integer}) was larger than the specified maximum ({1,number,integer}).
The number of workers argument must be specified as a scalar integer.
The number of workers argument must be specified as a vector of 2 scalar integers.
Specifying 0 for the maximum number of workers is inconsistent with specifying a nonempty pool argument. To run on the client, either omit the pool argument or specify an empty pool.
An invalid indexing request was made.\nThe numeric argument to Composite.exist must be an array of integers \nbetween 1 and the length of the Composite (length {0,number,integer}).
An invalid indexing request was made.\nThe argument to Composite.exist must either be numeric or logical.
An invalid indexing request was made.\nToo many values specified for exist.
The Composite has no value on the requested worker (worker {0,number,integer}).
不支持保存合成。
An invalid index ({0,number,integer}) was supplied when trying to set \na value of an Composite.
合成无效；它可能已保存并加载，但这是不允许的，或并行池已关闭。
发出的索引请求无效。
The number of values provided ({0,number,integer}) does not match the number of\nassignments to be made ({1,number,integer}).
Dot invocation is not allowed for Composites, use the functional form instead.
Array creation by indexed assignment from a Composite is not allowed.
An invalid indexing request was made.\nComposite objects only support simple indexing.
In Composite () assignments, the right-hand side value must be a cell.
An unexpected indexing request was made.
An invalid indexing request was made.\n{0} cannot be used as an index datatype.
An invalid indexing request was made.\n{0} cannot be used as an index expression.
The Composite has no value on the following worker(s): {0}.
合成无效；它可能已保存并加载，但这是不允许的，或并行池已关闭。
发出的索引请求无效。
Too many outputs ({0,number,integer}) requested for ''()'' indexing.
Dot invocation is not allowed for Composites, use the functional form instead.
Composite objects only support simple subscripting.
An unexpected Composite indexing request was made.
在工作进程 {0} 上检测到错误。
在工作进程 {0} 上检测到错误。
The remote object cannot be created because there is\na mismatch between the returned factory functions {0} and {1}.
An error occurred submitting the SPMD block for execution:\n {0}
{0} requires that all input Composites exist on all workers.
Failed to initialize SPMD. In might be necessary to restart the parallel pool.
收到了停止执行请求(Ctrl-C)。
初始化 SPMD 时，向池中添加工作进程。
Timeout was exceeded while initializing SPMD.
无法初始化 SPMD。请重新启动并行池。原因:\n{0}
无法初始化 SPMD。原因:\n{0}
SPMD block interrupted.
An unexpected attempt was made to build an MPI communicator\nof size {0,number,integer} when the current value of spmdSize is {1,number,integer}.
合成无效。
The Composite value cannot be accessed because \na remote operation is in progress.
Invalid Composite (the parallel pool in use has been closed).

An invalid Composite or distributed array was passed to an SPMD block.\nIt might have been saved and then loaded, or the parallel pool might have been shut down.\nUse parpool to start a new parallel pool.
Request to retrieve invalid Composite.
An unexpected attempt to build a resource set of size {0,number,integer} \nwas made.
The workers you have attempted to access are no longer available.\nThis may occur if the parallel pool has been shut down.\nUse parpool to restart the parallel pool.
"{0}" is not supported for Composite objects.
The second argument to {0} must be a cell array of input arguments.
The first argument to {0} must be a function handle.
The data had no value on the specified worker.
No cleanup return was received from worker {0,number,integer}. Delete pool and restart using parpool.
Could not create an SPMD block to match the requested size: {0}. The parallel pool size is: {1,number,integer}.
An unexpected attempt was made to build a remote SPMD resource set with no parallel pool.
The parallel pool being used by SPMD has been shut down.
An error occurred building remote objects on return from an SPMD block.
An error occurred during the cleanup following remote execution.
远程清除期间出现错误: {0}。
An unexpected attempt was made to use a remote SPMD executor with\nan invalid parallel resource set.
远程数据清除期间在工作进程 {0,number,integer} 上检测到错误: \n{1}.

Some of the Composites or distributed arrays passed to the SPMD block were not compatible with each other. Only Composites or distributed arrays created on the same sets of workers can be passed into a single SPMD block.

A Composite or distributed array was passed to an SPMD block with which it is not compatible. The Composite or distributed array was created for use with an SPMD block of size {0,number,integer}. This was sent for use with an SPMD block of size {1}.

A Composite or distributed array was passed to an SPMD block with which it is not compatible. The Composite or distributed array was created using a parallel pool which differs to the one which the SPMD block will execute against.
从工作进程检索的分布式数组或合成不可用。
发送给工作进程的分布式数组或合成不可用。
An error occurred during remote data retrieval.
An error occurred during remote data storage.
An error occurred during setup for remote data management. If this problem persists, you may need to delete and start the parallel pool again using parpool.
An error occurred while accessing remote data storage: \n{0}
分布式数组或合成在 SPMD 块的主体中使用，但没有直接出现在该块的主体中。如果分布式数组或合成存储在容器(如元胞数组或结构体)中，就会发生这种情况。以这种方式存储的分布式数组或合成在 SPMD 块的主体中不可用。{0}。
The Remote variable could not be found on the worker.
The required workers to execute the SPMD block are not available. This could be because one or more workers has crashed or lost network contact.
An unexpected attempt was made to use an invalid Resource Set object\nThis may occur if you attempt to save and load Composite objects.
An unexpected remote resource set was selected for remote execution.
Unexpected input arguments for ReturnableParcel construction.
Unexpected input arguments for SendableParcel construction.
SPMD 使用的并行池已关闭。
The parallel pool that SPMD was using has been shut down. Reason:\n{0}
The source code ({0}) for the SPMD block that is trying to execute on the worker could not be found.
Worker {0,number,integer} unable to find file.
An error occurred during setup for SPMD execution. If this problem persists, you may need to delete and start the parallel pool again using parpool.
An error occurred during SPMD execution:\n{0}.
The current parallel pool does not support SPMD.
尝试从工作进程 {0} 返回 SPMD 块输出时\n引发错误。
An unexpected index was supplied to getFromWorker for the trivial resource set.\nThe index was: {0,number,integer}.
An unexpected index key become unreferenced for the trivial resource set.\nThe index was: {0,number,integer}.
An unexpected index was supplied to setOnWorker for the trivial resource set.\nThe index was: {0,number,integer}.

An UndefinedFunction error was thrown on the workers for ''{0}''. This may be because the file containing ''{1}'' is not accessible on the workers. Specify the required files for this parallel pool using the command: addAttachedFiles(pool, ...). See the documentation for parpool for more details.
A consistency error was detected on remote object return.
Invalid key class - expected int64, got: "{0}".

SPMD 执行期间出错。系统已在工作进程上尝试中断执行。如果这种情况仍存在，可能需要使用 CTRL-C 中断执行，然后删除并重新启动并行池。

在工作进程 {0,number,integer} 上出现的错误是: 
{1}
。
清除远程数据时遇到以下警告:\n{0}。
检索合成值时遇到以下警告:\n{0}。
设置合成值时遇到以下警告:\n{0}。
